segment.source: title: Windows Server EULA
segment.target: title: Windows Server EULA

segment.source: Windows Server EULA
segment.target: Windows Server EULA

segment.source: MICROSOFT LICENSE TERMS FOR A VIRTUAL HARD DISK IMAGE OF THE FOLLOWING SOFTWARE:
segment.target: MICROSOFT LICENSE TERMS FOR A VIRTUAL HARD DISK IMAGE OF THE FOLLOWING SOFTWARE:

segment.source: MICROSOFT WINDOWS SERVER
segment.target: MICROSOFT WINDOWS SERVER

segment.source: These license terms are an agreement between Microsoft Corporation (or based on where you live, one of its affiliates) and you.
segment.target: These license terms are an agreement between Microsoft Corporation (or based on where you live, one of its affiliates) and you.

segment.source: Please read them.
segment.target: Please read them.

segment.source: They apply to the software product identified above and any documentation, which includes the media on which you received it (collectively referred to as the "software" or "VHD").
segment.target: They apply to the software product identified above and any documentation, which includes the media on which you received it (collectively referred to as the "software" or "VHD").

segment.source: The terms also apply to any Microsoft Internet-based services for this software.
segment.target: The terms also apply to any Microsoft Internet-based services for this software.

segment.source: BY USING THE SOFTWARE, YOU ACCEPT THESE TERMS.
segment.target: BY USING THE SOFTWARE, YOU ACCEPT THESE TERMS.

segment.source: IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THEM, DO NOT USE THE SOFTWARE.
segment.target: IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THEM, DO NOT USE THE SOFTWARE.

segment.source: AS DESCRIBED BELOW, USING SOME FEATURES ALSO OPERATES AS YOUR CONSENT TO THE TRANSMISSION OF CERTAIN STANDARD COMPUTER INFORMATION FOR INTERNET-BASED SERVICES.
segment.target: AS DESCRIBED BELOW, USING SOME FEATURES ALSO OPERATES AS YOUR CONSENT TO THE TRANSMISSION OF CERTAIN STANDARD COMPUTER INFORMATION FOR INTERNET-BASED SERVICES.

segment.source: YOUR RIGHT TO USE THE SOFTWARE IS LIMITED TO A SPECIFIED PERIOD OF TIME.
segment.target: YOUR RIGHT TO USE THE SOFTWARE IS LIMITED TO A SPECIFIED PERIOD OF TIME.

segment.source: PLEASE REFER TO SECTION 3 FOR DETAILS.
segment.target: PLEASE REFER TO SECTION 3 FOR DETAILS.

segment.source: If you comply with these license terms, you have the rights below.
segment.target: If you comply with these license terms, you have the rights below.

segment.source: INSTALLATION AND USE RIGHTS.
segment.target: INSTALLATION AND USE RIGHTS.

segment.source: Supersede other terms.
segment.target: Supersede other terms.

segment.source: The terms of this license supersede the terms of any Microsoft software license term agreement that requires “acceptance” of a separate license term agreement during installation.
segment.target: The terms of this license supersede the terms of any Microsoft software license term agreement that requires “acceptance” of a separate license term agreement during installation.

segment.source: Installation.
segment.target: Installation.

segment.source: You may install and use the software on your device of which you are running any virtualization software able to run Virtual Hard Disk (VHD) formats, including Microsoft Virtual Server.
segment.target: You may install and use the software on your device of which you are running any virtualization software able to run Virtual Hard Disk (VHD) formats, including Microsoft Virtual Server.

segment.source: Limited use rights.
segment.target: Limited use rights.

segment.source: You may use the software in the virtual hard disk image only to internally demonstrate and evaluate it.
segment.target: You may use the software in the virtual hard disk image only to internally demonstrate and evaluate it.

segment.source: You may not use the software in a live operating environment.
segment.target: You may not use the software in a live operating environment.

segment.source: No separation.
segment.target: No separation.

segment.source: The Microsoft software in the virtual hard disk image is licensed as a single piece of software.
segment.target: The Microsoft software in the virtual hard disk image is licensed as a single piece of software.

segment.source: The software may include tools and components to support new features of the operating system.
segment.target: The software may include tools and components to support new features of the operating system.

segment.source: You may not separate, use, or redistribute these tools or components for any purpose other than for use by those new features that are distributed as part of the operating system.
segment.target: You may not separate, use, or redistribute these tools or components for any purpose other than for use by those new features that are distributed as part of the operating system.

segment.source: For example, Service Fabric is a software component that may be used by the Network Controller feature of the operation system only.
segment.target: For example, Service Fabric is a software component that may be used by the Network Controller feature of the operation system only.

segment.source: Third party programs.
segment.target: Third party programs.

segment.source: The software may contain third party software programs that are licensed under proprietary terms that are presented to you.
segment.target: The software may contain third party software programs that are licensed under proprietary terms that are presented to you.

segment.source: The software may also contain third party open source programs that Microsoft, not the third party, licenses to you under Microsoft’s license terms.
segment.target: The software may also contain third party open source programs that Microsoft, not the third party, licenses to you under Microsoft’s license terms.

segment.source: Notices, if any, for the third party open source programs are included for your information only.
segment.target: Notices, if any, for the third party open source programs are included for your information only.

segment.source: INTERNET-BASED SERVICES.
segment.target: INTERNET-BASED SERVICES.

segment.source: Microsoft may provide Internet-based services with the software.
segment.target: Microsoft may provide Internet-based services with the software.

segment.source: It may change or cancel them at any time.
segment.target: It may change or cancel them at any time.

segment.source: Should the Virtual Hard Drive Image be configured to transmit over the Internet the following terms apply:
segment.target: Should the Virtual Hard Drive Image be configured to transmit over the Internet the following terms apply:

segment.source: Consent for Internet-Based Services.
segment.target: Consent for Internet-Based Services.

segment.source: Because this software is a pre-release version, we have turned on some internet-based features by default to obtain feedback about them.
segment.target: Because this software is a pre-release version, we have turned on some internet-based features by default to obtain feedback about them.

segment.source: The software features described below and in the Windows Privacy Statement connect to Microsoft or service provider computer systems over the Internet.
segment.target: The software features described below and in the Windows Privacy Statement connect to Microsoft or service provider computer systems over the Internet.

segment.source: In some cases, you will not receive a separate notice when they connect.
segment.target: In some cases, you will not receive a separate notice when they connect.

segment.source: In some cases, you may switch off these features or not use them.
segment.target: In some cases, you may switch off these features or not use them.

segment.source: For more information about these features, see go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506737.
segment.target: For more information about these features, see go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506737.

segment.source: By using these features, you consent to the transmission of this information to any country Microsoft operates in.
segment.target: By using these features, you consent to the transmission of this information to any country Microsoft operates in.

segment.source: The list below may not be fully-inclusive.
segment.target: The list below may not be fully-inclusive.

segment.source: Computer Information.
segment.target: Computer Information.

segment.source: Some software features use Internet protocols, which send to Microsoft (or its suppliers or service providers) computer information, such as your Internet protocol address, the type of operating system, browser and name and version of the software you are using, and the language code of the device where you installed the software.
segment.target: Some software features use Internet protocols, which send to Microsoft (or its suppliers or service providers) computer information, such as your Internet protocol address, the type of operating system, browser and name and version of the software you are using, and the language code of the device where you installed the software.

segment.source: Microsoft uses this information to make the Internet-based services available to you, in accordance with the Privacy Statement at go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506737.
segment.target: Microsoft uses this information to make the Internet-based services available to you, in accordance with the Privacy Statement at go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=506737.

segment.source: TIME-SENSITIVE SOFTWARE.
segment.target: TIME-SENSITIVE SOFTWARE.

segment.source: The software will stop running on 07/15/2016 (day/month/year).
segment.target: The software will stop running on 07/15/2016 (day/month/year).

segment.source: You will not receive any other notice.
segment.target: You will not receive any other notice.

segment.source: You may not be able to access data used with the software when it stops running.
segment.target: You may not be able to access data used with the software when it stops running.

segment.source: ACTIVATION.
segment.target: ACTIVATION.

segment.source: Activation associates the use of the software with a specific device.
segment.target: Activation associates the use of the software with a specific device.

segment.source: During activation, the software will send information about the software and the device to Microsoft.
segment.target: During activation, the software will send information about the software and the device to Microsoft.

segment.source: This information includes the version, language and product key of the software, the Internet protocol address of the device, and information derived from the hardware configuration of the device.
segment.target: This information includes the version, language and product key of the software, the Internet protocol address of the device, and information derived from the hardware configuration of the device.

segment.source: For more information, see go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=39157.
segment.target: For more information, see go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=39157.

segment.source: By using the software, you consent to the transmission of this information.
segment.target: By using the software, you consent to the transmission of this information.

segment.source: If properly licensed, you have the right to use the version of the software installed during the installation process up to the time permitted for activation.
segment.target: If properly licensed, you have the right to use the version of the software installed during the installation process up to the time permitted for activation.

segment.source: Unless the software is activated, you have no right to use the software after the time permitted for activation.
segment.target: Unless the software is activated, you have no right to use the software after the time permitted for activation.

segment.source: This is to prevent its unlicensed use.
segment.target: This is to prevent its unlicensed use.

segment.source: You are not permitted to bypass or circumvent activation.
segment.target: You are not permitted to bypass or circumvent activation.

segment.source: If the device is connected to the Internet, the software may automatically connect to Microsoft for activation.
segment.target: If the device is connected to the Internet, the software may automatically connect to Microsoft for activation.

segment.source: You can also activate the software manually by Internet or telephone.
segment.target: You can also activate the software manually by Internet or telephone.

segment.source: If you do so, Internet and telephone service charges may apply.
segment.target: If you do so, Internet and telephone service charges may apply.

segment.source: Some changes to your computer components or the software may require you to reactivate the software.
segment.target: Some changes to your computer components or the software may require you to reactivate the software.

segment.source: The software will remind you to activate it until you do.
segment.target: The software will remind you to activate it until you do.

segment.source: PRODUCT KEYS.
segment.target: PRODUCT KEYS.

segment.source: The software may require a key to install or access it.
segment.target: The software may require a key to install or access it.

segment.source: If it does, you are responsible for the use of keys assigned to you.
segment.target: If it does, you are responsible for the use of keys assigned to you.

segment.source: You should not share the keys with third parties.
segment.target: You should not share the keys with third parties.

segment.source: PRE-RELEASE SOFTWARE.
segment.target: PRE-RELEASE SOFTWARE.

segment.source: This software is a pre-release version.
segment.target: This software is a pre-release version.

segment.source: It may not work the way a final version of the software will.
segment.target: It may not work the way a final version of the software will.

segment.source: We may change it for the final, commercial version.
segment.target: We may change it for the final, commercial version.

segment.source: We also may not release a commercial version.
segment.target: We also may not release a commercial version.

segment.source: FEEDBACK.
segment.target: FEEDBACK.

segment.source: If you give feedback about the software to Microsoft, you give to Microsoft, without charge, the right to use, share and commercialize your feedback in any way and for any purpose.
segment.target: If you give feedback about the software to Microsoft, you give to Microsoft, without charge, the right to use, share and commercialize your feedback in any way and for any purpose.

segment.source: You also give to third parties, without charge, any patent rights needed for their products, technologies and services to use or interface with any specific parts of a Microsoft software or service that includes the feedback.
segment.target: You also give to third parties, without charge, any patent rights needed for their products, technologies and services to use or interface with any specific parts of a Microsoft software or service that includes the feedback.

segment.source: You will not give feedback that is subject to a license that requires Microsoft to license its software or documentation to third parties because Microsoft includes your feedback in them.
segment.target: You will not give feedback that is subject to a license that requires Microsoft to license its software or documentation to third parties because Microsoft includes your feedback in them.

segment.source: These rights survive this agreement.
segment.target: These rights survive this agreement.

segment.source: .NET FRAMEWORK SOFTWARE.
segment.target: .NET FRAMEWORK SOFTWARE.

segment.source: The software includes one or more components of the .NET Framework, which you may use only as described at go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=66406, if you use the .NET Framework components to conduct internal benchmark testing.
segment.target: The software includes one or more components of the .NET Framework, which you may use only as described at go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=66406, if you use the .NET Framework components to conduct internal benchmark testing.

segment.source: H.264/AVC AND MPEG-4 VISUAL STANDARDS AND VC-1 AND MPEG-2 VIDEO STANDARDS
segment.target: H.264/AVC AND MPEG-4 VISUAL STANDARDS AND VC-1 AND MPEG-2 VIDEO STANDARDS

segment.source: This software may include H.264/AVC, VC-1, and MPEG-4 Part 2, and MPEG-2 visual compression technology.
segment.target: This software may include H.264/AVC, VC-1, and MPEG-4 Part 2, and MPEG-2 visual compression technology.

segment.target: tout ce qui est relié au logiciel, aux services ou au contenu (y compris le code) figurant sur des sites Internet tiers ou dans des programmes tiers ; et

segment.source: les réclamations au titre de violation de contrat ou de garantie, ou au titre de responsabilité stricte, de négligence ou d’une autre faute dans la limite autorisée par la loi en vigueur.
segment.target: les réclamations au titre de violation de contrat ou de garantie, ou au titre de responsabilité stricte, de négligence ou d’une autre faute dans la limite autorisée par la loi en vigueur.

segment.source: Elle s’applique également, même si Microsoft connaissait ou devrait connaître l’éventualité d’un tel dommage.
segment.target: Elle s’applique également, même si Microsoft connaissait ou devrait connaître l’éventualité d’un tel dommage.

segment.source: Si votre pays n’autorise pas l’exclusion ou la limitation de responsabilité pour les dommages indirects, accessoires ou de quelque nature que ce soit, il se peut que la limitation ou l’exclusion ci-dessus ne s’appliquera pas à votre égard.

segment.source: EFFET JURIDIQUE.
segment.target: EFFET JURIDIQUE.

segment.source: Le présent contrat décrit certains droits juridiques.
segment.target: Le présent contrat décrit certains droits juridiques.

segment.source: Vous pourriez avoir d’autres droits prévus par les lois de votre pays.
segment.target: Vous pourriez avoir d’autres droits prévus par les lois de votre pays.

segment.source: Le présent contrat ne modifie pas les droits que vous confèrent les lois de votre pays si celles ci ne le permettent pas.
